      • getDefaultFormat

        public static java.text.DecimalFormat getDefaultFormat(boolean replaceSpacesToNoBrSpace)
        Parameters:
        replaceSpacesToNoBrSpace - Convert spaces to no-break space (U+00A0) to fix problems with browser conversions. Space is not valid thousands-separator, but no-br space is.
        Returns:
        See Also:
        AbstractNumberConverter
